QuestData.Title: Sanctum Upgrade: Mirror Network
QuestData.Description:
We got a Scroll of Dark Empowerment ready for youz that should manifest 'em mirror frames for you. Pre'y standard work.
Once you do the conjurin', then ol' Laurent should be able to work 'is magic as it were. Right proper glass guy he is.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Scroll of Dark Empowerment to conjure a Mirror Network.
